summary:
With 15 years of experience in the tourism industry of which over a decade in TUI's sustainability team, I gained extensive knowledge of the positive and negative impact of travel and tourism and beyond. In my current role, I'm the co-creator of the TUI Group Sustainability agenda and responsible for a range of sustainable transformation projects. These include two of industry leading projects: the Rhodes Co-Lab and the TUI Sustainability Academy. As a leader in sustainability I'm is a big proponent of collaborative approaches that creates positive impact for the business, the industry and beyond.

With strategic thinking, to the point actions and aiming for continuous improvement of the high quality work I deliver, I contribute to making the world a better place. My extensive travel experience, education and career shaped my view of the world and my strive for a more sustainable planet.

Destinations also include cities as New York, Rome, Dubai, Barcelona, Singapore, Prague, Oslo and many more.

In my years at the agency, we got rewarded with the Travel Agency of the Year Award in the "Noord-Holland region" in 2010 and 2011, and Runner-Up in 2011 in the competition "Best Travel Agency of The Netherlands".
